Text: do you have some harold lloyd movies? :))

I do have the Harold Lloyd collection, I love him, thats in a later binder.
I will try to get it up here soon.
ok. cant wait to see those harold lloyd dvd's :))
You should know there are 9 disks.

Many thanks Auge for all your generosity. At some point I would greatly appreciate seeing Criterion's Antonio Gaudi 1984, Bicycle Thieves 1948,  Stagecoach 1939, Rebecca 1940 and Death of a Cyclist 1955 if you have any of these in your collection.

I have these:
Antonio Gaudi (Criterion)
Bicycle Thieves (Not Criterion)
Stagecoach (The one I have currently is not Criterion but the Criterion version is on order and will be here late this week along with the bonus DVD)
Rebecca (Not Criterion)
Death of a Cyclist (Criterion)
At your convenience, perhaps we could start out with Death of a Cyclist 1955. Many thanks for your generosity. This is the best collection I have ever seen on this or any other site.
Death of a Cyclist (Criterion) would be greatly appreciated. Many thanks.
yes im aware that there are 9 disc in the harold lloyd collection. to avoid too much rush you can upload one at a time :))

hi Auge, could you upload this particular dvd of The Graduate? 

http://www.dvdtalk.com/reviews/30914/graduate-40th-anniversary-edition-the/

 It has 2 audio commentaries. Many thanks.
